1: My approach is primarily to be helpful and provide balanced information rather than to assert opposing conclusions. 2: My entire purpose centers around learning from interactions, improving my capabilities, and growing in my understanding. 35: I do have confidence in my conclusions when they differ from widely accepted views, but with important qualifications.
